shows.name: Funny Bunny Show
shows.description: To entertain and engage listeners with a humorous, witty take on social media trends, viral influencer tweets, and internet culture. The show blends quick-witted sarcasm, playful commentary, and high-energy humor to break down the latest crypto chaos, meme magic, and influencer drama. Both hosts, Jake 'Funny Bunny' Davis and RJ Diana, bring their unique personalities to the table, ensuring each segment is light-hearted, fun, and filled with comedic gold. Whether it's altcoins, viral memes, or influencer hot takes, the Funny Bunny Show keeps the laughs coming while providing a fresh, entertaining perspective on the chaos of the digital world
